channel.title: 华尔街日报

item.title: "她从不承认自己有问题"一个从成功人士跌落到无家可归的女人 仍然像个百万富翁一样侃侃而谈让她得到帮助似乎是不可能的
item.description:
“She wasn’t ever going to admit she had a problem.” A woman who tumbled from success to homelessness still talked like a millionaire. Getting her help seemed impossible. https://t.co/7U3aJEOzu8 https://t.co/7U3aJEOzu8

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 7, 2024

item.title: 医院急诊室的精神健康问题儿童激增。有些儿童在医院等待精神治疗的时间长达数周。"这让我感到不安，我真的无法形容"。

item.title: 很多漫画家都蜕变成了银幕明星，但没有人像凯文-哈特这样。"无论你是不是我的粉丝，你都必须尊重我所做的一切。直截了当地说，"他说。
item.description:
Lots of comics have morphed into screen stars, but there's no one like Kevin Hart. "Whether you’re a fan or not, you have to respect what I’ve done. Point-blank," he says. https://t.co/ZgxEmAQeJm pic.twitter.com/amEeBn6rTV

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 7, 2024

item.title: 来自@WSJopinion：民调显示，尼基-海利（Nikki Haley）将给共和党选民带来 2024 年压倒性胜利的可能，但他们却决定赌上特朗普的第三次提名。他们不能说她没有警告过他们。
item.description:
From @WSJopinion: The polls suggest Nikki Haley would give GOP voters the potential for a 2024 landslide, but they have decided to gamble on a third Trump nomination. They can’t say she didn’t warn them. https://t.co/iKXJGFVRJy

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 7, 2024

item.title: 如果您自动将佛罗里达海滩度假与迈阿密联系在一起，那您可能就错过了。以下是您应该去迈阿密的邻居--劳德代尔堡（Fort Lauderdale）一探究竟的原因。
item.description:

item.title: 自哈马斯 10 月 7 日发动袭击以来，美国在未通知国会或公众的情况下向以色列转移了数万件武器，这打破了政府在加沙战争期间数十年来的惯例
item.description:
The U.S. has transferred tens of thousands of weapons to Israel since Hamas’ Oct. 7 attacks without notifying Congress or the public, breaking with decades of government norms during the war in Gaza https://t.co/nbeay8OONJ https://t.co/nbeay8OONJ

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 6, 2024

item.title: 汉娜-古铁雷斯-里德（Hannah Gutierrez-Reed）是《锈迹斑斑》片场负责武器的装甲师，一名摄影师在片场遭到致命枪击，新墨西哥州陪审团认定她犯有过失杀人罪。
item.description:
Hannah Gutierrez-Reed, the armorer in charge of weapons on the “Rust” set where a cinematographer was fatally shot, was found guilty of involuntary manslaughter by a New Mexico jury https://t.co/UU01bHrgXz https://t.co/UU01bHrgXz

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 6, 2024

item.title: 乌克兰与俄罗斯之间的战争前线现已延伸至非洲。随着乌克兰战事几近胶着，一场全球武器和经济资源争夺战正在形成，双方都在为一场可能持续更长时间的战争做准备。
item.description:
The front line in the war between Ukraine and Russia now extends into Africa.

With fighting in Ukraine at a near stalemate, a global battle over weapons and economic resources is taking shape, as both sides dig in for a war that could last much longer. https://t.co/kB0oYEIvUJ

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 6, 2024

item.title: 一艘悬挂巴巴多斯国旗的船只在也门胡塞武装的袭击中遇袭，船上三人死亡。这是自叛军组织 11 月底开始在红海地区袭击船只以来已知的第一起人员死亡事件。
item.description:
Three people on board a Barbados-flagged ship died after it was struck in an attack claimed by Yemen’s Houthis. They're the first known loss of life since the rebel group began attacking ships in the Red Sea region in late November. https://t.co/I8XVmTLL3N https://t.co/I8XVmTLL3N

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 6, 2024

item.title: 英国广告监管机构推翻了早些时候做出的禁止 Calvin Klein 一则广告的决定，他们认为该广告将歌手 FKA Twigs 表现为 "刻板的性对象"。
